RESPONDENT'S EXHIBITS: NIL TRUE COPY PA TO JUDGE Scl. BISA 2017/KER/49784 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. Cril.M.C. No. 8546 of 2017 Dated this the 8 day of December, 2017 ORDER In case of surrender the petitioner before the court below within 15 days from today, the court below shall consider and dispose of the application seeking bail that may be filed by the petitioner with advance notice to the learned Public Prosecutor in charge of the case, preferably on the same day itself. This Crl.M.C.is allowed as above. Sd/- B.KEMAL PASHA JUDGE Scl/08.12.2017
